text: Cecil Dale Andrus (August 25, 1931 - August 24, 2017) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was Governor of Idaho for 14 years. He was governor from 1971 to 1977 and again from 1987 to 1995. He was U.S. Secretary of the Interior from 1977 to 1981, during the Carter administration. Andrus died on August 24, 2017 in Boise, from complications of lung cancer."Former Democratic Idaho Governor Cecil Andrus dies at 85", KIVI- TV, August 25, 2017. title: Cecil D. Andrus
